actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Stafford under the authority of the order of May 13, 81. With written report No. 97-112.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 140.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: An original bill to authorize appropriations for the Clean Air Act for fiscal year 1982.

summary.text: Amends the Clean Air Act to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1982 to carry out the provisions of such Act (other than research, development, and demonstration activities).

titles.title: An original bill to authorize appropriations for the Clean Air Act for fiscal year 1982.
